Description: Limestone ostracon. 14 lines of text on recto and 16 lines on verso containing a petitio and a promissio.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (113-119)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (331)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82873) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82873)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Victor (son of Isak)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 7 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
